alert.note: Alert for Steuben (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Steuben, southeastern Hillsdale, Williams and Fulton Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1100 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Morenci to near Holiday City to near Edon. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bryan, Wauseon, Archbold, Montpelier, Delta, Edgerton, West Unity, Pioneer, Stryker, Fayette, Edon, Holiday City, Edgerton In Williams County, Columbia, West Jefferson, Pulaski, Lyons, Waldron, Blakeslee and Prattville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 155 and 156. Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
